course_name: Psychological Skills Training Techniques in Sport
school: Human Movement & Nutrition Sci, Psychology School
description: Practical and theoretical components of psychological skills training programs designed for athletes, coaches and officials in a wide variety of sports for use with novices to elite. Consideration of various populations.
prerequisites: Provisional or full registration as a Psychologist with the Psychology Board of Australia.
restricted: MPsych or with permission of the Director if the Psychology Program.
